summary.span: 允许使用自定义逻辑提交工作批次。

span.span: Allows custom logic for the commitment of work batches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当提交工作批次时，运行时将对 进行调用并为其提供委托，调用该委托可以对工作批次执行实际提交。When a work batch is committed the runtime calls into the and gives it a delegate to call to do the actual committing of the work batch. 运行时仍承担提交工作批次的主要责任，但允许 将自身插入到进程中，以便根据提交进程进行自定义。The runtime still has the primary responsibility of committing the work batch but allows the to insert itself in the process for customization around the commit process. 此进程允许自定义错误处理逻辑。This process allows custom error handling logic. 如果 拥有事务（当 属性返回 `null` 时会出现这种情况，因此必须创建新的环境事务），则允许多次调用委托，为每次调用创建一个新的事务。If the owns the transaction, which is the case when the property returns `null` therefore necessitating the need to create a new ambient transaction, it is allowed to call the delegate more than once, creating a new transaction for each call. 例如，一个最常见的情况就是处理间歇性网络问题或 SQL 群集故障转移。The most common case for this for example is to handle intermittent network problems or SQL cluster failovers. 如果对 的调用引发了异常，则 可以捕获此异常、启动新的事务并再次调用委托。If the call to the throws an exception can catch this exception, start a new transaction and call the delegate again. 这为工作流实例执行提供了一定的弹性，否则将导致工作流终止。This gives a level of resilience to workflow instance execution that otherwise would cause workflows to terminate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个从 继承的类。The following example demonstrates a class that inherits from . [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#0)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#0)]
